title: Hanya Yanagihara | Trump Hangs Up on NPR After Being Fact-Checked on Election Lies: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at former President Trump abruptly ending an NPR interview after getting fact-checked on his 2020 election lies.

Then, author Hanya Yanagihara talks about the unique way her readers interact with her, discusses her book To Paradise and explains why she turned down an invitation to a college orgy.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
